data.description: tranasctional update to a set of files
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The module manipulates files so it belongs in File::, and the
    object encapsulates an in-progress transaction, hence
    File::Transaction.

    Example of an application that could make use of this module: a web
    based message board in which multiple HTML files are modified with
    each message posted.
